Instance.description: Breed properties and various gameplay behaviors.

TunableEnum.name: breed_species
TunableEnum.description: This breed is restricted to this species.

TunableEnum.name: breed_tag
TunableEnum.description: The tag associated with this breed.

TunableList.name: breed_traits
TunableList.description: Traits that are by default associated with this breed.

TunableList.name: breed_voices
TunableList.description: A list valid voice actors and pitch ranges that this breed can have when randomly generated.

Tunable.name: breed_voice_actor_index
Tunable.description: The breed's default voice actor is a combination of its species and index. In general, 0-3 is mapped to A-D, though not all species have all four. (The mapping of species+index to voice actor is maintained in CASSharedUtils.cpp.) Dogs and small dogs share the same voice actors, and have four: Index 0 - DogA (Generic Dog) Index 1 - DogB (Small Yappy Dog) Index 2 - DogC (Tough Dog) Index 3 - DogD (Big Dumb Hound Dog) Cats have two: Index 0 - CatA (Generic Cat) Index 1 - CatB (Scratchy Alley Cat)

TunableTuple.name: breed_voice_pitch
TunableTuple.description: Min/max voice pitch that the breed will have.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: sim_info_resources
TunableList.description: A list of YA resources for the breed. CAS will attempt to age down or up when they are generating the sim info with the age we pass in through the SimInfo.
